dimension: 11 1/4 x 10 1/2 in. (28.58 x 26.67 cm) (does not include strap)
title: Woman's bag
description: Red vertical stripes and blue, black, white and green stripes divided by thin yellow stripes. decorative fringe around the edge organized in sections with two knots; striped ribbon strap.
creditline: Gift of Richard L. Simmons in memory of Roberta Grodberg Simmons
